name: breeze-next
description: Next version of Breeze, built using TypeScript 2.

scripts.rollup-full: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.full.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/breeze.debug.js temp/breeze.full.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/breeze.min.js build/breeze.debug.js
scripts.rollup-base: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.base.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/breeze.base.debug.js temp/breeze.base.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/breeze.base.min.js build/breeze.base.debug.js
scripts.rollup-ajax-angular: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.ajax-angular.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/adapter-ajax-angular.js temp/adapter-ajax-angular.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/adapter-ajax-angular.min.js build/adapter-ajax-angular.js
scripts.rollup-ajax-jquery: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.ajax-jquery.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/adapter-ajax-jquery.js temp/adapter-ajax-jquery.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/adapter-ajax-jquery.min.js build/adapter-ajax-jquery.js
scripts.rollup-data-odata: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.data-odata.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/adapter-data-service-odata.js temp/adapter-data-service-odata.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/adapter-data-service-odata.min.js build/adapter-data-service-odata.js
scripts.rollup-data-webapi: npm run rollup -- -c ./rollup/rollup.data-webapi.js && npm run tsc-es5 -- --out build/adapter-data-service-webapi.js temp/adapter-data-service-webapi.es2015.js && npm run minify -- --output build/adapter-data-service-webapi.min.js build/adapter-data-service-webapi.js
